General.Name: Berjaya Food Bhd
General.Description: Berjaya Food Berhad, an investment holding company, develops and operates restaurants and café chains, and retail outlets in Malaysia and other Southeast Asian countries. The company operates a chain of Kenny Rogers Roasters (KRR) restaurants in Malaysia; Starbucks stores, including drive-thru stores in Malaysia; Starbucks stores, including drive-thru concept store in Brunei; and Jollibean outlets, Sushi Deli outlets, and Kopi Alley outlet in Singapore. It also operates as a food caterer; and provides interior design services. The company was incorporated in 2009 and is based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. Berjaya Food Berhad is a subsidiary of Berjaya Group Berhad.
